Alert Name: bush
Ford CEO's Bush joke blown out of proportion
Alan Mulally apologizes for his claim of keeping the president from plugging in an electrical cord into the wrong socket and saving his life.
04/11/07 04:15 PM, EDT
Ford Motor Co. Chief Executive Alan Mulally is no longer laughing about his suggestion that he saved President Bush's life during a recent White House visit.
